evidence.claim: PX Technology utilizes AWS services including Lambda and S3 for scalable cloud architecture.
The company highlights HIPAA compliance across its health-tech initiatives.
PX Technology integrates with EHR systems using FHIR standards.
They mention using X12 transaction sets for electronic data interchange (EDI) processes.
Working with third-party data platforms indicating reliance on cloud services for data handling.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 for integration, indicating alignment with API-first healthcare data exchange needs.
